sen.j: 和田埠頭（わだふとう）とは、京都府舞鶴市にある舞鶴湾に整備される約33haの埠頭である。
sen.e: Wada Wharf covering an area of about 33 hectares is scheduled to be constructed in the Maizuru Bay in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Wada Wharf covering an area of about 33 hectares is scheduled to be constructed in the Maizuru Bay in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Wada Wharf covering an area of about thirty-three hectares is scheduled to be constructed in the Maizuru Bay in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: 舞鶴港は、京阪神地域の日本海側の最も重要な拠点港であり、近年では上海市航路が就航するなどさらにその重要性が高まっている。
sen.e: The Maizuru Port located on the side of the Japan Sea is the most important base port in the Keihanshin area, and its importance has been increasing recently due to a reason that the sea transportation service to Shanghai City started, and other reasons.

The Maizuru Port located on the side of the Japan Sea is the most important base port in the Keihanshin area, and its importance has been increasing recently due to marine transportation that is now offered to Shanghai, among other reasons.

The Maizuru Port located on the side of the Japan Sea is the most important base port in the Keihanshin area, and its importance has been increasing recently due to marine transportation that is now offered to Shanghai, among other reasons.

sen.j: しかし、外国との貿易港である舞鶴西港は、商港でありながら漁港でもあるため、近年海運の主役となっている大型コンテナ船の就航が難しかった。
sen.e: However, the Maizuru Nishi Port, port for foreign trade, functions not only as a commercial port but also as a fishing port; therefore, there was a difficulty in operating the service of large-scale container vessels which have been playing the leading part in the sea transportation recently.

However, the Maizuru Nishi Port, port for foreign trade, functions not only as a commercial port but also as a fishing port; therefore, there was difficulty in operating service for large-scale container vessels which have recently played a leading part in marine transportation.

However, the Maizuru Nishi Port, port for foreign trade, functions not only as a commercial port but also as a fishing port; therefore, there was difficulty in operating service for large-scale container vessels which have recently played a leading part in marine transportation.

sen.j: そこで京都府などでは新たな専用埠頭を建設し、5万トン級のフルコンテナ船が就航できる多目的国際埠頭として2010年（平成22年）の供給を目指し整備を行っている。
sen.e: Then, aiming at the start of supply in 2010, Kyoto Prefecture newly develops and constructs a dedicated wharf so that it works as a multipurpose international wharf responding to 50,000 ton-class full-container vessels.

In order to meet the supply in 2010, Kyoto Prefecture is constructing and developing a dedicated wharf to work as a multipurpose international wharf responding to 50,000 ton-class full-container vessels.

In order to meet the supply in 2010, Kyoto Prefecture is constructing and developing a dedicated wharf to work as a multipurpose international wharf responding to 50,000 ton-class full-container vessels.

sen.j: 現在は第一期工事（13ha）の最中であり、埠頭自体では岸壁部分が完成している。
sen.e: At present, the first phase of construction (13 hectares) is in progress, and as to the wharf itself, the quay part is completed.
At present, the first phase of construction (13 hectares) is in progress, and as to the wharf itself, the quay part is completed.
At present, the first phase of construction (thirteen hectares) is in progress, and as to the wharf itself, the quay part is completed.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: また、和田埠頭へのアクセス道路として臨港道路が建設中である。
sen.e: As an access road to Wada Wharf, a seaside road is now under construction.
As an access road to Wada Wharf, a seaside road is now under construction.
As an access road to Wada Wharf, a seaside road is now under construction.

sen.j: その中でも「安久トンネル」は2005年（平成17年）9月9日に貫通し、2008年を目途に整備される予定となっている。
sen.e: On the way of such seaside road, the 'Agu Tunnel' was completed on September 9, 2005, and the road is scheduled to be completed in 2008.
Among these, the 'Agu Tunnel' was completed on September 9, 2005, and the road is scheduled to be completed in 2008.
Among these, the 'Agu Tunnel' was completed on September 9, 2005, and the road is scheduled to be completed in 2008.
